name: DOWN (Andy_Delgado)
description:
GO DOWN AND TAKE YOUR ENEMIES WITH YOU! In the game "DOWN" the only button you need is the down key.  Bounce off enemies heads and press down again to deliever a swift downward slash! Earn points by hitting enemies on their head, smaller enemies give a higher score. Don't touch the floor and have fun.

Music Credit: Eric Skiff

 Music Name: We Are Resistors 

Website:  http://ericskiff.com/music/
